LanguageData.ATR_MechanicalOptimization.label: Mechanical optimization
LanguageData.ATR_MechanicalOptimization.description: Standardization alone will not solve everything - further progress will require a revolution of efficiency and precision. New standards for optimization, accuracy, and capability will need to be developed. Once achieved, humanity's more wild ideas fall within reach.
LanguageData.ATR_T3Androids.label: T3 androids
LanguageData.ATR_T3Androids.description: Tier three androids are marked by their scale and sheer capabilities. Dwarfing humans at an average height of 7-9 feet - necessary to contain the vast requisite resources for operation - and intimidating in both strength and acuity, these units are clear evolutions of human design.
LanguageData.ATR_SurrogateOptimization.label: Optimized surrogate protocols
LanguageData.ATR_SurrogateOptimization.description: With a great deal of advancement in both fabrication capabilities and protocol optimization, it may very well be possible to develop a method for organics to both become and utilize surrogates. This is a revolutionary capability, but one fraught with moral and ethical concerns. Is this a line that shouldn't be crossed?
LanguageData.ATR_CommunicationOptimization.label: Optimized communication
LanguageData.ATR_CommunicationOptimization.descriptio: In order to extend the power of the communication network and prepare for a centralized host system, optimization to communication relays and the systems that control them must be developed.
LanguageData.ATR_MilitaryBiomimetics.label: Military biomimetics
LanguageData.ATR_MilitaryBiomimetics.description: Iterating upon utility biomimetics, this research delves into military applications. Significantly more complicated than copying mere domesticated farm animals, militarization can lead to miniature swarm drones, mechanical hounds, or more experimental adaptations.
LanguageData.ATR_ServerOptimization.label: Server optimization
LanguageData.ATR_ServerOptimization.description: Optimizing servers for space and utility is expensive, but promises to bring revolutionary expansion to the colony's insight generation. Combining storage and generation, these servers could make older models obsolete.
LanguageData.ATR_T4Androids.label: T4 androids
LanguageData.ATR_T4Androids.description: Tier four androids are marked by their possession of an archotech AI persona core. The possession of such a thing greatly reduces the need for space and therefore size and weight. While its capabilities do not inherently exceed that of a tier three, its persona core does undeniably confer benefits.
LanguageData.ATR_CoreAssistants.label: Core assistance
LanguageData.ATR_CoreAssistants.description: With the acquisition of proper fabrication capabilities and a strong standardization scheme, advancements in the quality of mechanical parts is now within reach. There is spare space in all androids' heads, primarily for protective padding purposes - advanced specialized chips could occupy some of that space instead.
LanguageData.ATR_RepairOptimization.label: Repair Optimization
LanguageData.ATR_RepairOptimization.description: Optimization to repair stimulants should allow for significantly increased recovery speed and operation success chance in mechanical units. The quality of these stimulants is comparable to that of glitterworlds' stimulants - technology in this field has only come so far, even for them.
LanguageData.ATR_SkyMindCore.label: SkyMind Core
LanguageData.ATR_SkyMindCore.description: The pinnacle of mechanical and consciousness research, a theoretical supercomputer core capable of permanently storing, saving, replicating, and allowing the full use of consciousnesses is within reach. It is incredibly expensive, but it offers a glimpse of immortality. Acquiring and coaxing so many AI personas to play babysitter and host will be difficult. Finding the vanometric power cells necessary to keep the superstructure secure and isolated may be equally difficult.
